function.name: news_for_yahoo_finance
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "yahoo_finance", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "returns latest news_for_yahoo_finance articles related to symbol passed as parameter"

function.name: trend_for_yahoo_finance
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "yahoo_finance", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This reflects the insurance company's profits over given periods of time.
This endpoint also gives **experts** & **AI supported predictions** about stock future behavior"

function.name: historic_data_for_yahoo_finance
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "yahoo_finance", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "return historic data
interval - The time interval between two data points. Can be 1m 2m 5m 15m 30m 60m 90m 1h 1d 5d 1wk 1mo 3mo
range - The range for which the data is returned.

for normal stocks :
you can directly search by tickername:
eg. tsla , msft , "

function.name: balance_sheet_for_yahoo_finance
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "yahoo_finance", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "A **balance sheet** is a financial statement that communicates the so-called “book value” of an organization, as calculated by subtracting all of the company's liabilities and shareholder equity from its total assets."

function.name: price_for_yahoo_finance
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "yahoo_finance", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Returns the Stock Price Information for the symbol passed as parameter

for normal stocks :
you can directly search by tickername:
eg. tsla , msft , meta

for crypt:
try searching by ticker name followed by -USD.
for bitcoin try : btc-usd
for eth try : eth"

function.name: esg_for_yahoo_finance
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "yahoo_finance", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Simply explained, an esg_for_yahoo_finance score is a measure of a company's exposure to long-term environmental, social, and governance risks that are often overlooked during traditional financial analyses."

function.name: finance_analytics_for_yahoo_finance
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "yahoo_finance", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "This API endpoint also returns **AI recommendation**
Financial analysis refers to an assessment of the viability, stability, and profitability of a business, sub-business or project. It is performed by professionals who prepare reports using ratios and oth"

function.name: earnings_for_yahoo_finance
function.description:
This is the subfunction for tool "yahoo_finance", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "A company's earnings_for_yahoo_finance are its after-tax net income. This is the company's bottom line or its profits. Earnings are perhaps the single most important and most closely studied number in a company's financial statements.
This API **also** ret"

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

train_messages.content:
You are AutoGPT, you can use many tools(functions) to do the following task.
First I will give you the task description, and your task start.
At each step, you need to give your thought to analyze the status now and what to do next, with a function call to actually excute your step.
After the call, you will get the call result, and you are now in a new state.
Then you will analyze your status now, then decide what to do next...
After many (Thought-call) pairs, you finally perform the task, then you can give your finial answer.
Remember: 
1.the state change is irreversible, you can't go back to one of the former state, if you want to restart the task, say "I give up and restart".
2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
Let's Begin!
Task description: You should use functions to help handle the real time user querys. Remember:
1.ALWAYS call "Finish" function at the end of the task. And the final answer should contain enough information to show to the user,If you can't handle the task, or you find that function calls always fail(the function is not valid now), use function Finish->give_up_and_restart.
2.Do not use origin tool names, use only subfunctions' names.
You have access of the following tools:
1.yahoo_finance: Access Yahoo Finance Realtime Stock Price |  Options | ESG | Trends | Statistics | Earnings | Balance Sheets | Analytics | Asset Profile and much more

Give me the balance sheet, ESG score, and financial analytics for Tesla (symbol: TSLA). I'm also interested in the index trend and earnings trend for the company.
Begin!

Before you generate my thought for this state, I will first show you your previous actions for this state, and then you must generate actions that is different from all of them. Here are some previous actions candidates:
[
  {
    "name": "balance_sheet_for_yahoo_finance",
    "arguments": "{\n  \"symbol\": \"TSLA\"\n}",
    "function_output": "{\"error\": \"Unsubscribed error...\", \"response\": \"{'message': 'You are not subscribed to this API.'}\"}",
    "mento-carlo-action-value": 0.0
  }
]

Remember you are now in the intermediate state of a trail, you will first analyze the now state and previous action candidates, then make actions that is different from all the previous.
